author: marioevz
content: Update on the EELS release for BAL Devnet-2, we are [4](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pulls?q=is%3Apr+milestone%3A"bal+devnet-2"+is%3Aclosed) out of [7](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pulls?q=is%3Apr+milestone%3A"bal+devnet-2"+is%3Aopen) PRs merged. We'll try to make a release in the coming days for everyone to consume the tests and validate implementations!

author: siladu
content:
Started collecting data here, will update as I go, only one full day so far...
https://hackmd.io/@siladu/H11EKOkLZx

TLDR: measured 517MiB increase in 24 hours, so projected annual growth of 184 GiB.
Obviously 24 hours is not very representative so will continue measuring.

Will also look into supporting `debug_stateSize` RPC and getting Besu's data alongside Geth's on https://lab.ethpandaops.io/ethereum/execution/state-growth

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Can you break the growth down by area?

author: siladu
content:
Yep added it here https://hackmd.io/@siladu/H11EKOkLZx#Net-growth-per-state-column-family-24h
and raw data linked as well now.
